property.name: author
property.value: Elizabeth Latronico (beth@berkeley.edu), based on IPAddress actor\n by Christopher Brooks

property.name: description
property.value: This accessor outputs the IP address of the local machine.

property.name: trigger (port)
property.value: ({names:["boolean"]}) Send a token here to produce an output.

property.name: IPAddress (port)
property.value: ({names:["string"]}) The IP address of the local machine.
